Class Auto_tests

java.lang.Object
HW3_automatedtests.Auto_tests
public class Auto_tests extends Object
A comprehensive test suite for the Question and Answer management system. This class contains automated tests for various database operations including question management and answer handling.

The test suite includes the following test cases:

  • Answer addition functionality
  • Question addition functionality
  • Answer update functionality
  • Answer resolution functionality
  • Question retrieval functionality

Each test case is executed independently and reports its success or failure. A summary of all test results is displayed at the end of execution.

See Also:

  • Question

      public Auto_tests()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point for the test suite. Executes all test cases and displays the results.

      The test execution flow:

      1. Connects to the database
      2. Executes each test case in sequence
      3. Displays individual test results
      4. Shows final summary of passed and failed tests
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments (not used)

    • performTestCase

      public static void performTestCase(int testCase, String inputText, Auto_tests.TestMethod method)
      Executes a single test case and reports its result.
      Parameters:
      testCase - the test case number
      inputText - description of the test case
      method - the test method to execute

    • delete_all_questions

      public static void delete_all_questions() throws SQLException
      Deletes all questions from the database for test isolation. This method ensures a clean state before running each test.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • testAddAnswer

      public static boolean testAddAnswer() throws SQLException
      Tests the answer addition functionality. Verifies that an answer can be successfully added to a question.

      Test steps:

      1. Creates a test question
      2. Adds an answer to the question
      3. Verifies the answer was added successfully
      Returns:
      true if the answer addition test passes, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • addQuestion_test

      public static boolean addQuestion_test() throws SQLException
      Tests the question addition functionality. Verifies that a question can be successfully added to the database.

      Test steps:

      1. Clears all existing questions
      2. Adds a test question
      3. Verifies the question was added successfully
      Returns:
      true if the question addition test passes, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • testUpdateAnswer

      public static boolean testUpdateAnswer() throws SQLException
      Tests the answer update functionality. Verifies that an answer can be successfully updated in the database.

      Test steps:

      1. Creates a test question and answer
      2. Updates the answer with new content
      3. Verifies the answer was updated successfully
      Returns:
      true if the answer update test passes, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • testMarkAnswerAsResolved

      public static boolean testMarkAnswerAsResolved() throws SQLException
      Tests the answer resolution functionality. Verifies that an answer can be successfully marked as resolved.

      Test steps:

      1. Creates a test question and answer
      2. Marks the answer as resolved
      3. Verifies the answer was marked as resolved
      Returns:
      true if the answer resolution test passes, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getQuestion_test

      public static boolean getQuestion_test() throws SQLException
      Tests the question retrieval functionality. Verifies that questions can be successfully retrieved from the database.

      Test steps:

      1. Clears all existing questions
      2. Adds multiple test questions
      3. Retrieves all questions
      4. Verifies all questions are present
      Returns:
      true if the question retrieval test passes, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
